activities: Maxpoint is an advertising targeting technology firm.  Our technology collects various pieces of non-personally identifiable information, including browser version, operating system, IP address, cookie or mobile device identifiers, click and conversion data, web page or application visited, ads shown, and date and time of visit. We also collect aggregate demographic data. Our technology delivers advertising globally and transfers data from the EU to the US. Maxpoint has an office in the UK, and employee data may be stored in the US.
contactoff1: MaxPoint Interactive, Inc. in Morrisville, NC
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Non-personally identifiable information used for advertising, including IP addresses, clickstream data, and cookie and device identifiers, Human resources data, which may include manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Digital Advertising Alliance, Network Advertising Initiative
